WorkItem.Description: Dear Sir/Madam,I need one demonstration of the detailed steps with the screenshots for one Biztalk 2009 solution which will perform these below. It can have 2 projects inside doing the following and will call DB stored procedures Upd_status, Upd_status2 respectively.1. in Upd_status, do an insert by also capturing the current path and filename of the input Flat file, into StatusTab table in Upd_status and mark the status column of the current record as 'Received'2. call Upd_status2, which will then retrieve all records with 'Received' status and then inside Biztalk project, the process will load the relevant input Flat file by the file name column just retrieved, into TransTab tableMany Thanks & Best Regards,HuaMin

Comments.Message: Need some demonstration for such project

Hi,

Many Thanks & Best Regards,
HuaMin
